title: For US locations of Sam's Club (NYSE: WMT), state the change in fuel sales between FY 2024 and FY 2025. Express the answer in $M.
description:
1. Find US Sam's Clubs fuel sales in FY 2024. From Walmart's FY 2025 10-K, fuel sales are not disclosed separately, but can be found by subtracting net sales including fuel ($86,179M) and net sales excluding fuel sales ($75,057M). Net fuel sales: $86,179M-$75,057M = $11,122M.
 
 2. Find US Sam's Clubs fuel sales in FY 2025. From Walmart's FY 2025 10-K, fuel sales are not disclosed separately, but can be found by subtracting net sales including fuel ($90,238M) and net sales excluding fuel sales ($79,777M). Net fuel sales: $90,238M-$79,777M = $10,461M.
 
 3. Compare US Sam's Clubs fuel sales between FY 2024 and FY 2025. $10,461M (FY 2025) - $11,122M (FY 2024) = -$661M.

rubric.criteria: Find US Sam's Club FY 2024 net sales including fuel: $86,179M
Find US Sam's Club FY 2024 net sales excluding fuel: $75,057M
Calculate US Sam's Club FY 2024 net fuel sales: $86,179M-$75,057M = $11,122M
Find US Sam's Club FY 2025 net sales including fuel: $90,238M
Find US Sam's Club FY 2025 net sales excluding fuel: $79,777M
Calculate US Sam's Club FY 2025 net fuel sales: $90,238M-$79,777M = $10,461M
Calculate difference between FY 2024 and FY 2025 net fuel sales: $10,461M (FY 2025) - $11,122M (FY 2024) = -$661M
